Редактирование
Количество символов меньше 3
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApplicationType } from '../../modal/applicationtype.mode'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edittype', templateUrl: './edittype.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edittype.component.css'] }) export class EdittypeComponent { hideModal: boolean = false; type: ApplicationType ={ id: -1, name: '' } Close() { this.hideModal=!this.hideModal } }
